meanings.definition: A thing that one does not know the name of.
meanings.sent1: I found a strange thingumajig in the attic.
meanings.sent2: Can you hand me that thingumajig over there?
meanings.sent3: The thingumajig in the kitchen drawer turned out to be a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was like a bottomless thingumajig, hiding all sorts of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The old house was full of dusty thingumajigs waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: An object whose name is forgotten or not known.
meanings.sent1: Grandma always had a collection of thingumajigs on her shelf.
meanings.sent2: I need to find that thingumajig to fix the leak.
meanings.sent3: The thingumajig in the garage turned out to be a rare antique.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with mysterious thingumajigs hidden among the trees.
meanings.sent5: The box was full of colorful thingumajigs from around the world.

meanings.definition: A gadget or device whose name is unknown or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used a special thingumajig to fix the engine.
meanings.sent2: I can't remember where I put that electronic thingumajig.
meanings.sent3: The thingumajig in the lab was beeping nonstop.
meanings.sent4: Her phone was a magical thingumajig that could do anything.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's workshop was full of strange thingumajigs waiting to be tested.
